name: Alone in the Park (Fraisies)
description:
Alone in the Park is an experience of contemplation and exploration.

You play a child and your only goal is to have fun before the night comes.

Update

Certain bugs have been fixed and we have a special Level hiding in the park now !

Credits

Léa - Level design

Lucie Marques - Graphics

Maëlle Fanget - Graphics

Franck Caget - Developement

Made with Unity
